name: War is Heaven
description:
WAR is HEAVEN — jam version

programming, design, music, and art by cryy22. this is my first game jam.

Made in 72 hours for minijam 119: heaven^2.

You are Neffie, Agent 777 in the H.E.A.V.E.N. uh... agency.  As peacekeepers, our aim is always to save lives by killing lots of other stuff.

EVERYTHING CAN DIE — wish the enemy wouldn't do the thing they're about to do? kill their intent. want the enemy to do less damage? kill their attack value. want to remove your poison debuff? yep, just kill the debuff.

Neutralize the enemy by killing the things that make them dangerous, like their attack power or their poisonousness. But take care not to kill the enemy themselves. Oh, and please do try and keep yourself alive too while you're at it.

Good luck, Agent 777.

  • open source at github

KNOWN BUGS

  • playing the "BigShot" card is loud. you have been warned!
  • if the enemy's intent is to increase their poison (green arrow), killing the enemy's poisonousness on that turn will lock the game. likewise with increasing attack (yellow arrow) and the enemy's attack value. please avoid this scenario or press the reset button.
  • the Reset button always takes you back to the first enemy, even if you've beaten them already. luckily, they're a pushover.
